summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3728 for the improvement of alley in Block 12, John's Addition and Block 12 Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between 11th Avenue North and 12th Avenue North, from Edgar Street to Hamlin Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45796, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
